question:
Consider the following statements about the proposed National Medical Commission (NMC):
  1. NMC will consist of 25 members appointed by the central government
  2. The chairperson of the commission will have a maximum term of four years
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The National Medical Commission Bill, 2017 was recently introduced in the parliament by the Minister of Health and Family Welfare. It proposes to set up the National Medical Commission (NMC). As per the bill, the commission is to be set up within three years of the passage of the Bill. It will consist of 25 members, appointed by the central government. The chairperson of the commission will be appointed for a term of four years. The NMC Bill, 2017 also seeks to allow practitioners of Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Yoga and other alternative medicines to enter the field of modern medicine after completing a “bridge course”.
